channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2025071256
item.description:
Report X-2025071256

Identified by scraper @ 2025-07-23T00:58:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-07-15
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Undeclared hazmat found during screening. Other undeclared hazmat found with no release as follows. (Replicating questions 14-29) UN1950, Aerosols, 2.1//not shipped as hazardous waste//not toxic by inhalation//not shipped under Exemption, Approval, or CA number//shipment was undeclared with no release//packaging type non-bulk/outer packaging plastic box// ********* Shipper declared that he had 4 lithium-ion batteries contained in equipment [under wH limit] separated into different boxes. while screening shipment had lots of clutter seemed to have aerosols and batteries. 7 batteries were found when shipment was physically searched the shipment, one over 100 wH. 1 aerosol was also found in the shipment

item.title: Report X-2025071089
item.description:
Report X-2025071089

Identified by scraper @ 2025-07-23T00:58:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-07-10
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO (2) LEAKING PACKAGES OFFERED IN GROUND SERVICE TO ALASKA FROM CALIFORNIA THAT TRANSPORTED BY AIR. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (1) 2 GALLON PAIL OF CORROSIVE ACC MICRO FINISH GEL IN EACH PACKAGE. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER: 1Z054V9R0327390591 DESTINED FOR 11531 HIGHLAND ST IN ANCHORAGE, AK 99515. NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. PACKAGES OFFERED TO THE UPS STORE BY JOSHUA HEDDEN.

item.title: Report X-2025070452
item.description:
Report X-2025070452

Identified by scraper @ 2025-07-23T00:58:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-07-01
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 07/01/25 at approximately 15:20, during x-ray screening in the ANC cargo warehouse a shipment appeared to have a few cans with concave bottoms contained within. Upon a targeted physical search, four cans of insect repellent were found. Pictures and a report were then taken and the aerosol cans were removed. aerosol insect repellent cans have a FLAMMABLE/CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE and KEEP AWAY FROM HEAT, SPARKS, AND OPEN FLAME hazard warnings on the aerosol cans. CUTTER BACWOODS INSECT REPELLENT 6oz - FLAMMABLE/CONTENTS UNER PRESSURE OFF! CLEAN FEEL INSECT REPELLENT 5oz - FLAMMABLE/CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE OFF! FAMILY CARE INSECT REPELLENT 4oz (x2) - FLAMMABLE/CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE

item.title: Report X-2025071254
item.description:
Report X-2025071254

Identified by scraper @ 2025-07-23T00:58:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-06-25
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At approximately 11:15AM on 6/25/2025, FedEx Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Anchorage station concerning tracking 426816118198. The shipment contained a UN rated steel drum with 29.6L of UN3082 Environmentally Hazardous Substance N.O..S. The shipment was found during loading to have a small puncture near the bottom chine, spilling roughly 0.5L. The station's dangerous goods spill cleanup specialist contained the spill and placed into a salvage drum. The shipment is currently being held at the Anchorage station.

(Replicating questions 14-29)1266, Perfumery products, 3// UN1263, Paint, 3//not shipped as hazardous waste//not toxic by inhalation//not shipped under Exemption, Approval, or CA number//shipment was undeclared with no release//packaging type non-bulk/outer packaging textile bag// While screening the suitcases i noticed what appeared to be an aerosol can. Upon further inspection I found a dry shampoo aerosol can, also a body spray, nail polish and versace perfume.

item.title: Report X-2025061468
item.description:
Report X-2025061468

Identified by scraper @ 2025-07-23T00:58:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-06-13
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At approx 11:15AM on 6/13/2025, FedEx Dangesrous Goods Administration received a call from Anchorage, AK Ramp for an ID8000 spill of perfume in a fibreboard box. The outer packaging fibreboard box appeared to be damaged by water/rain, comprimising the integrity of the box. Internally there was a small 100mL perfume bottle that was cracked at the cap due to an unknown cause, resulting in total loss of product. The shipment has been disposed of.
